bibl.title: The 'Galatian Shield without Σ' Series of Ptolemaic Bronze Coins.
bibl.note: I. Style. - II. Technical features. - III. The die study. - IV. Proposed classification. - V. Sicilian finds of Ptolemaic bronze coins. - VI. Chronological indicators. - VIIa. Attribution of 'Galatian shield without Σ' series of 'West Greek' style to Hieron II of Syracuse. - VIIb. Attribution of 'Galatian shield without Σ' coins of 'Alexandrian' style to a Ptolemaic mint on Sicily. - VIII. The transition to explicitly Hieronian coinage. - IX. The rise of Hieron II. - X. The 'Galatian shield without Σ' bronzes in their historical context. - XI. The size of the coinage. - XII. Conclusions. - Pp. 37-42: Appendix 1. Die study of 'Galatian shield without Σ' series bronze coins; - 43-48: Appendix 2. Statistical Analyses [D.W.].
